thread.title: Ex-MI6 officer Christopher Steele, who produced Donald Trump Russian dossier, breaks his silence
thread.title_full: Ex-MI6 officer Christopher Steele, who produced Donald Trump Russian dossier, breaks his silence

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Ex-MI6 officer Christopher Steele, who produced Donald Trump Russian dossier, breaks his silence
text:
Ex-MI6 officer Christopher Steele, who produced Donald Trump Russian dossier, breaks his silence Orbis Business Intelligence offices in central London Credit: REUTERS/Stefan Wermuth Telegraph Reporters 7 March 2017 â€¢ 3:32pm 
E x-MI6 officer Christopher Steele, who was behind a dossier of allegations about Donald Trump , has broken his silence to say he is back working at his London-based intelligence firm Orbis. 
Speaking outside his firm's offices in Belgravia, he told the Press Association: "I'm really pleased to be back here working again at the Orbis's offices in London today. 
"I'm now going to be focusing my efforts on supporting the broader interests of our company here. 
"I'd like to say a warm thank you to everyone who sent me kind messages and support over the last few weeks. 
"Just to add, I won't be making any further statements or comments at this time." Watch | Christopher Steele's neighbours: "I never knew we had spies in Wokingham" 00:32
